title: "Launch Legacy Client" link on new client not working
body: The new client is too laggy on my computer and always crashes after champ select which is why I like playing on the old legacy client. But now, every time I try switching back to it, the client just crashes. Every time I open up the client again it is back to the new client

replies.body:
Can you try launching League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) in case this changes anything?

Let me know if this resolved the issue you're seeing. ^.^
I tried doing it a couple of times but nothing opens up after the League of Legends logo appears on my screen

In this case, what's most likely happening is that your patcher can't establish a good link to our patching servers. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will walk you through the common culprits and how to solve them.

Get back to me if you still encounter these issues after taking those steps.
IM having the same problem the legacy client won't open when i click the link for it on the new one. I also experienced freezing of the new client when running it after champion selection.
